EmailTemplate.name: 26Sept13:SOI.SOI No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you - Resources from our SOI Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
You were missed at our “Future of Work: MBO State of Independence Study 2013" webinar held on Thursday, September 26. Steve King and Carolyn Ockels, Partners at Emergent Research, joined MBO Partners CEO Gene Zaino to break down new research on America's independent workforce. Below you will find links to the material created for the webinar. Remember: the slides are copywritten material, so please do not repost or repurpose in any way. Recorded webinar <http://video.mbopartners.com/players/ZDlHwe4P-mMm4x1IW.html> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/9.26.13-SOI-Webinar.pdf> Full SOI Report (PDF) <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/2013-MBO_Partners_State_of_Independence_Report.pdf> ___________________________________
Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners t: 703-793-6368
e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com
w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
